attributes.action: All culled badgers should be PM'd and the results published
attributes.additional_details:
All badgers killed in the culls to have a post-mortem and all results to be published. Number of healthy badgers, in the case of unhealthy individuals, the diseases they are suffering from and especially those suffering from active TB and those with TB antibodies.
The variety of TB - human, bovine, badger, other - to be determined.
